name: cardano-cli-ts
author: √çcaro C. Capobianco
description: Wrapping cardano-cli seemed like the lazy thing I would do

scripts.watch-es5: tsc -p tsconfig.json --target es5 --outDir es5 --module commonjs --watch --declaration false
scripts.watch-es6: tsc -p tsconfig.json --target es6 --outDir es6 --module es6 --watch --declaration false
